oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Assessment of two devices for measuring tympanic membrane temperature in swine, dairy cattle, and dairy calves
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Myers, M. J.
Henderson, M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: tympanic membrane temperature
rectal temperature readings
mercury thermometer
dairy cattle
dairy calves
swine
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We compared tympanic membrane temperature readings obtained by 2 commercially available devices with rectal temperature readings obtained with a standard mercury thermometer in dairy cattle, dairy calves, and swine. Full article published in Journal American Veterinary Medical Association (1996); 208, 1700-1701
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1996; 133
